member.name: T:ExtendedRichTextBox.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: Une classe de ressource fortement typée destinée, entre autres, à la consultation des chaînes localisées.

member.name: P:ExtendedRichTextBox.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Retourne l'instance ResourceManager mise en cache utilisée par cette classe.

member.name: P:ExtendedRichTextBox.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Remplace la propriété CurrentUICulture du thread actuel pour toutes les recherches de ressources à l'aide de cette classe de ressource fortement typée.

member.name: F:ExtendedRichTextBox.TextAlign.Left
member.summary: The text is aligned to the left.

member.name: F:ExtendedRichTextBox.TextAlign.Right
member.summary: The text is aligned to the right.

member.name: F:ExtendedRichTextBox.TextAlign.Center
member.summary: The text is aligned in the center.

member.name: M:ExtendedRichTextBox.AdvRichTextBoxPrintCtrl.EndUpdate
member.remarks: This method should be called every time a call is made made to BeginUpdate. It resets the event mask to it's original value and enables redrawing of the control.

member.name: P:ExtendedRichTextBox.AdvRichTextBoxPrintCtrl.SelectionAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the alignment to apply to the current selection or insertion point.

member.name: P:ExtendedRichTextBox.AdvRichTextBoxPrintCtrl.SelectionList
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the currently selected text uses a ListFormat.
member.remarks: Returns whether the currently selected text's ListFormat equals the currently chosen ListFormat.

member.name: P:ExtendedRichTextBox.AdvRichTextBoxPrintCtrl.ListFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the format to use on lists.

member.name: T:ExtendedRichTextBox.AdvRichTextBoxPrintCtrl.ListFormats
member.summary: Represents an enumeration of valid formats for lists in the control.
